title: More images of the contextual looking letters in the Aldine book Hypnerotomachia Poliphili
content:
More images of the contextual looking letters in the Aldine book Hypnerotomachia Poliphili  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157604825884265/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730053034/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157604825884265/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157604825884265/")

The new images are at the end. Although they are not as close as the older ones they are clearer than my older ones.
author: ebensorkin

comments.content:
Thanks! Please keep uploading those wonderful pictures.

Elí

You are welcome. I will probably try to get closer and more detailed just because I can now.

The only sad part is that it is easier BY FAR to take images of this stuff in the US than it is here in the UK. Apparently Italy is a bit better. Well one museum in particular... I tempted to fly there NOW!
